error_general_message: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
error_wrong_email_or_password: The email or password is incorrect. Please try again.
error_network_message: Please check your internet connection and try again.
error_permission_message: Permission denied. Please try again later.
login_screen.title: Challenge yourself, reach your goals.
login_screen.description1: Boost your skills with personalized challenges and unleash your full potential in both personal and professional realms.
login_screen.description2:
Inspire others to achieve greatness
 by engaging with their challenge updates 
and fostering a community of achievement.
login_screen.description3:
Enhance your team's performance
 by organizing challenges to promote individual 
 and group progress, strenghthening collective soft skills.
